html:
Role Voice type Premiere Cast,
16 November 1850[30]
(Conductor: -)
Stiffelio, a Protestant minister tenor
Lina, his wife soprano
Count Stankar, her father, an elderly retired military officer baritone
Raffaele di Leuthold, a friend of the family, supposedly a count, Lina's lover tenor
Jorg, an elderly minister, Stiffelio's spiritual mentor bass
Dorotea, Lina's cousin mezzo-soprano
Federico di Frengel, Lina's cousin tenor
